body_html: @josh11b this request seems pretty open-ended. But could you comment on our plans for future C++ support? I think C++ is considered one of our officially supported languages, and is probably second-most popular after Python.
body_text: @josh11b this request seems pretty open-ended. But could you comment on our plans for future C++ support? I think C++ is considered one of our officially supported languages, and is probably second-most popular after Python.
body: @josh11b this request seems pretty open-ended. But could you comment on our plans for future C++ support? I think C++ _is_ considered one of our officially supported languages, and is probably second-most popular after Python.
